name: Drahim Holdings
description: Developer of a financial planning platform designed to manage all accounts and transactions from one place. The company's platform customizes the budget according to spending categories and schedules recurring operations, enabling users to get suggestions on how to save money and budget their finances better and help them grow their wealth by investing their savings using auto investment
one_liner: Developer of a financial planning platform designed to manage all accounts and transactions from one place. The company's platform customizes the budget according to spending categories and schedules recurring operations, enabling users to get suggestions on how to save money and budget their finances better and help them grow their wealth by investing their savings using auto investment
